forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly clear, with a low around 46. Southwest wind 2 to 6 mph.

forecast.name: Saturday
forecast.detailedForecast: Sunny. High near 61, with temperatures falling to around 57 in the afternoon. South southwest wind 2 to 6 mph.

weather_report:
As twilight descends upon Downtown San Francisco, the city lies under a blanket of clear skies, a serene backdrop enhanced by the cool embrace of late evening. The air carries a crisp chill, dipping to about 46 degrees, inviting layers of warmth. Wisps of wind tickle through the streets, whispering tales of the day as they flutter at a gentle pace between two to six miles per hour. Tomorrow beckons with the promise of sunshine, a lovely respite from the dimming light of the day. Expect the high to flirt around 61 degrees before softening in the afternoon, while the calmer winds will continue to accompany us from the southwest.

The evening's clarity suggests an absence of the characteristic fog that frequently envelops the coastal city, allowing the Golden Gate Bridge and its graceful arches to stand prominently. With the absence of a marine layer, the crystalline view unfolds, perfect for a thoughtful stroll along the waterfront or a quiet reflection in one of the many parks. A cozy sweater or light jacket would be prudent for those venturing outdoors, ensuring comfort against the cool air. As evening deepens, consider indulging in an atmospheric café, where the warmth of coffee blends nicely with the calm energies of the city, or take a casual walk that invites the city's gentle rhythm to seep into you.
